2 from threading import Lock
3 
4 
5 class SQLiteDAO:
6 
7  def __init__(self, db_path):
8  self.__lock = Lock()
9  self.__con = sqlite3.connect(db_path, check_same_thread=False)
10  self.__con.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
11  self.__cursor = self.__con.cursor()
12 
13  def __del__(self):
14  try:
15  self.__con.close()
16  except AttributeError:
17  pass
18 
19  @property
20  def last_row_id(self):
21  return self.__cursor.lastrowid
22 
23  def execute(self, *args, **kwargs):
24  with self.__lock:
25  exec_result = self.__cursor.execute(*args, **kwargs)
26  self.__con.commit()
27  return exec_result
